items.name: accessToCatOnActive
items.title: Access to Categories (Active Status)
items.tooltip: Determines the categories users can access when they have an active subscription

items.name: uploadToCatOnActive
items.title: Access to Uploads (Active Status)
items.tooltip: Determines the categories users can upload to when they have an active subscription

items.name: accessToCatOnHold
items.title: Access to Categories (On Hold Status)
items.tooltip: Determines the categories users can access when they have an on hold subscription status

items.name: uploadToCatOnHold
items.title: Access to Uploads (On Hold Status)
items.tooltip: Determines the categories users can upload to when they have an on hold status

items.name: accessToCatOnExpire
items.title: Access to Categories (Expire Status)
items.tooltip: Determines the categories users can access when they have an expired subscription

items.name: uploadToCatOnExpire
items.title: Access to Uploads (Expire Status)
items.tooltip: Determines the categories users can upload to when they have an expired subscription
